Game.Name: Squashed (USA) (Proto)
Game.plot: Ninja Jajamaru: Ginga Daisakusen is an Action game, developed and published by Jaleco Entertainment,which was released in Japan in 1991.
Game.Notes: Squashed is a vegetable themed an action platform game and stars a friendly ninjas named Maru and Cori. You must help King Kale battle robots and vegetable themed enemies in order to protect six worlds from being overthrown by his nemesis Vegetron. The gameplay is very similar to Super Mario Bros. 3 and the original Mega Man series.
